headline: ADVANCED ENERGY RF PLASMA GENERATOR POWER SUPPLY 900W, 350 KHZ

Model PDX9002V
Description RF Plasma Generator
Rated Power Output 900 Watts

Output Impedance 50 Ohms

Output Connector Type N

Output current: 6.0 amp max
Forward or load power regulation modes
